name: YouTube Black Theme [V1.0.2]
description:
Makes almost everything on YouTube black!

This style works when YouTube's own dark theme is on and off, but to use the complete Black Theme, please turn off the dark theme.

If you find any issues, please let me know via the Feedback button below!

user.name: Lekrkoekj
user.about: Hello there! I make dark themes for websites (mostly Google sites). I'm very inactive though

additional_info: Version 1.0.2 The Featured channels header is now white. Version 1.0.1 Badges are now readable. Version 1.0 Initial release.
